thread.title: QuWave Announces Back to School Sale
thread.title_full: QuWave Announces Back to School Sale

author: prbuzz.com
title: QuWave Announces Back to School Sale
text:
Ledgewood, NJ (PR Buzz) September 10, 2015--- QuWave announces a new back to school sale ending Monday, September 21 at midnight Pacific Standard Time. All products in the online store will be $50 off through that period.
The coupon code for this sale is SCHOOL15. The coupon code needs to be entered at checkout on the shopping cart and the 'update cart' button needs to be clicked after entering the code for the discount to take effect.
All products in the QuWave online store will be discounted $50 through the back to school sale. These products include the popular Defender line, designed to protect against spiritual attacks, psychic attacks, or electronic harassment, the Harmonizer line , designed to improve well-being and protect against the harmful effects of electromagnetic fields, and the various solfeggio frequency units, which produce effects ranging from falling in love (Amore) to improving sleep (Dreamer) and producing spiritual experiences (Divine).
QuWave site-wide sales can be combined with already discounted bundle packages . Some of these bundles give discounts up to 50% off. QuWave allows exchanges in the bundle packages for items of equivalent value. For example in the Couples Protection Discount Package (consisting of two highly discounted Personal Harmonizers), one or both of the Harmonizers can be substituted for Personal Defenders or any personal solfeggio unit.
Early September marks the end of summer and the time many students go back to school. It's common to purchase items for use by students and teachers during this period.
More information about this sale can be found at: http://quwave.com/backtoschool2015.html
About QuWave:
QuWave LLC, a prominent organization in the energy medicine field, manufacturing unique and active products that block the negative effects of EMF pollution and radiation while also generating Scalar Waves, Solfeggio Frequencies, Schumann Resonance, and Chi Orgone energies to promote a healthy, balanced lifestyle. QuWave is an online company located in Ledgewood, NJ that has customers, affiliates, and resellers around the world. For more information on QuWave, visit www.QuWave.com
